title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 425.5 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 425.5 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) A charge will
be made of 25 cents per photocopy of pages not larger than 8 1/2 inches by 14
inches. (b) Charges for material or
services not specified by statute or regulation shall be based on the actual
cost thereof to the board. (c) Payment for information services should be made by cash or check or money order
payable to the "Chairman, Workers' Compensation Board."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
425.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
